name: Raise Finance
intro: Decentralized on-chain payments and fundraising platform
introduce: Raise Finance is building an easy-to-integrate #web3 engine for games/apps/e-stores to receive crypto payments and raise funds via customizable RaisePay widgets, RaiseStore, and RaiseLaunchpad. Raise Pay is a blockchain-based payment system that allows users to receive instant worldwide on-chain payments in crypto via ZkSync. By integrating a raise store solution, users/merchants can create onchain stores on Telegram, and by connecting Argent, and Metamask wallets, users/merchants can buy/sell goods and services as well as complete on-chain cryptocurrency transactions from anywhere in the world.
